message: anyone here using ep.io ?
I've played around with it, and have been nothing but impressed.
@ericflo ah thanks, i guess i'm off to their support then
Yeah, they don't let you write to the filesystem, so you'll have to use a S3 storage backend or something like that.
@ericflo i was under the impression they did http://www.ep.io/blog/writable-storage/
@ericflo i'm very impressed, just rolled out a test app a couple of minutes ago... very damn impressive

what i needed help with was their write dir:  ../data/ I get a SuspiciousOperation when using an imagefield in one of my models ... i know i should probably be asking their support but thought somebody here would have a quick answer
